attributes.action: Make google reverse their third party repair policy/ban.
attributes.background: On the 22nd May 2019 Google brought out a new policy to block all adverts relating to the repair of computers and other technology goods. This policy has had a detrimental affect on many legitimate computer repair shops and companies across the UK and beyond.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for Google. The UK Government and Parliament isn't responsible for deciding what adverts are accepted by companies like Google, unless those adverts break the law.
